headline.main: REICH ACCUSES U.S. OF DUAL VIOLATION; Holds Ship Seizure Contrary to International Law and to Our Sabotage Act ROME EMBASSY GUARDED Troops Stationed Close By to Prevent Demonstrations, Which Fail to Develop

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, April 1 -- While German charges of abandonment of the principles of international law by the United States continue to receive editorial formulation in the press, it was charged today that the seizure of German, Italian and Danish ships and the arrest of their crews represented a double violation of law.
abstract: U S Rome Embassy guarded against demonstrations which fail to materialize
